title: Language Proficiency Enhancement Program Utilizing Storytelling and Role-Play

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners Primarily Require Practical Language Proficiency Enhancement and Are Familiar with Interactive Digital Device Activities

learning_goals: Learners can perform role-playing games based on given story scenarios and utilize context-appropriate vocabulary and expressions with 80% accuracy.
Learners can solve language tasks by applying logical explanation and argumentation skills through story-based collaborative activities.
Learners can self-assess and peer-assess language skills acquired within a story three or more times through formative evaluation.

resources: Digital storytelling authoring tools (e.g., digital whiteboards)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
